amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception from the provisions of the bill for any claim for monetary relief under the Civil Rights Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 221 (Roll no. 24).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 221 (Roll no. 24).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Conyers.
